lyrics.text:
Pea ko hotau kakano
‘E ‘ikai mohe ma’u
Ka ‘e puna ki ‘olunga
‘I he ‘aho lahi.

Ko e toetu’u lahi,
Pea ‘e ongo mai
‘A e me’a lea mālohi
Pea fakamui.

Ko e fekau ke tu’u hake
‘A hotau kāinga,
Pea ‘alu ki he langi
‘A e angatonu.

Ko e ngaahi pule’anga
‘I he kelekele,
Ke mou ‘ā, ‘o ‘alu hake
Ki he fakataha.

’E hoko ki honau ‘Eiki
‘A e kakai tui
‘I he funga ‘o e lelei
Fakalaumālie.
